description.value: This cloth vestment features the heraldry or symbol associated with an entity (such as a deity, kingdom, or organization). Knights typically wear it over armor and other clothing, helping them identify allies on the battlefield or distinguishing themselves in more peaceful situations. An individual wearing a tabard gains a +1 item bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression] on creatures who have a positive association with the entity represented on the tabard.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
